Understanding OSINT: Gathering Intelligence from Public Sources

Understanding OSINT: Gathering Intelligence from Public Sources Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) refers to the collection and analysis of publicly available information. It plays an important role in cybersecurity, threat intelligence, and digital investigations. With OSINT techniques, analysts can uncover valuable data about individuals, systems, or organizations without accessing private or restricted resources. What is OSINT? OSINT involves gathering data from...
